long_description: Wear the Throttle Cap from Outdoor Research for running and other activities where you want sun protection and good sweat wicking. Breathable, lightweight fabric and soft headband wick moisture and dry quickly to keep your head cool and dry. Folding brim lets you stow the hat easily in a pocket or pack. Quick-release buckle clips the cap to a belt loop or pack strap. Outdoor Research Throttle Cap features reflective trim for increased visibility in low light. Closeout.
short_description: Wear the Throttle Cap from Outdoor Research for running and other activities where you want sun protection and good sweat wicking.
